      • addEntry

        public Menu addEntry(java.lang.String action_str,
                     MenuAction action)
        adds an entry to the menu. position will be assigned incrementally based oin the number of elements in the menu
        Parameters:
        action_str - the string the entry will be described with
        action - a MenuAction or null for a default action (returns call index)
        Returns:
        this

      • addEntry

        public Menu addEntry(java.lang.String action_str,
                     MenuAction action,
                     int position)
        adds an entry to the menu
        Parameters:
        action_str - the string the entry will be described with
        action - a MenuAction or null for a default action (returns call index)
        position - the position in the list the entry will be displayed: negative values start from the end (-1 = last)
        Returns:
        this

      • addEntry

        public Menu addEntry(int call_index,
                     java.lang.String action_str,
                     MenuAction action)
        adds an entry to the menu
        Parameters:
        action_str - the string the entry will be described with
        action - a MenuAction or null for a default action (returns call index)
        call_index - the index the user will choose with
        Returns:

      • addEntry

        public Menu addEntry(int call_index,
                     java.lang.String action_str,
                     MenuAction action,
                     int position)
        adds an entry to the menu
        Parameters:
        action_str - the string the entry will be described with
        action - a MenuAction or null for a default action (returns call index)
        position - the position in the list the entry will be displayed: negative values start from the end (-1 = last) or null to assign it based on the number of elements in the menu
        call_index - the index the user will choose with
        Returns:
        this
